publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1909 Aileen Campbell: Cathy Wilkes Nominated for Turner Prize—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow-based artist Cathy Wilkes on being shortlisted for the Turner Prize; believes this will serve as inspiration to other modern artists across Scotland, and wishes all contenders for the prize well in the final round of judging.
S3M-1909 Cathy Wilkes Nominated for Turner Prize (lodged on 14 May 2008) Alex Neil*, Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-1909 Aileen Campbell: Cathy Wilkes Nominated for Turner Prize—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow-based artist Cathy Wilkes on being shortlisted for the Turner Prize; believes this will serve as inspiration to other modern artists across Scotland, and wishes all contenders for the prize well in the final round of judging. Supported by: Alex Neil, Jamie Hepburn, Michael Matheson*
S3M-1909 Cathy Wilkes Nominated for Turner Prize (lodged on 14 May 2008) Keith Brown*
S3M-1909 Cathy Wilkes Nominated for Turner Prize (lodged on 14 May 2008) David Stewart*
